entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming west 20 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers this evening and after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
